# Resource: aws_macie2_organization_configuration

Provides a resource to manage Amazon Macie configuration settings for an organization in AWS Organizations.

## Example Usage

```typescript
// DO NOT EDIT. Code generated by 'cdktf convert' - Please report bugs at https://cdk.tf/bug
import { Construct } from "constructs";
import { TerraformStack } from "cdktf";
/*
 * Provider bindings are generated by running `cdktf get`.
 * See https://cdk.tf/provider-generation for more details.
 */
import { Macie2OrganizationConfiguration } from "./.gen/providers/aws/macie2-organization-configuration";
class MyConvertedCode extends TerraformStack {
  constructor(scope: Construct, name: string) {
    super(scope, name);
    new Macie2OrganizationConfiguration(this, "example", {
      autoEnable: true,
    });
  }
}

```

## Argument Reference

This resource supports the following arguments:

* `autoEnable` - (Required) Whether to enable Amazon Macie automatically for accounts that are added to the organization in AWS Organizations.

## Attribute Reference

This resource exports no additional attributes.
